metadata.narrative: Phoenix answered after the Sentinels loss with improved rebounding discipline and crisp off-ball motion to free shooters.

playerBios.name: Maya Santos
playerBios.playingStyle: Movement shooter with improved on-ball counters.
playerBios.seasonNotes: Added relocation threes from corner-to-wing cuts; stamina trending upwards.

playerBios.name: Nia Hart
playerBios.playingStyle: Switchable wing; strong at initiating dribble handoffs.
playerBios.seasonNotes: Focus on weak-side screening angles to spring Santos.

playerBios.name: Isaac Long
playerBios.playingStyle: Rim deterrence plus improved short-roll passing.
playerBios.seasonNotes: Implemented quick seal technique after film review of Sentinels game.

coachStrategies.name: Arjun Patel
coachStrategies.gamePlan: Push Pilots into rotations via double-stagger sets and Spain pick-and-roll.
adjustments: Early timeout to demand deeper corner spacing; Santos responded with 5 threes.
Closed with Hart at the four for switching versatility and rebounding.

coachStrategies.name: Lena Cho
coachStrategies.gamePlan: Aggressive nail help to bottle Pilot guards while trusting Long to clean glass.
adjustments: Mixed in surprise blitzes on Pilots' lead guard to speed decisions.
Implemented tag-and-release plan on Pilots' dunker spot cuts.

events.description: Santos hit consecutive threes off stagger screens, forcing early timeout.
events.impact: Set offensive tone; Pilots chased shooters rest of night.

events.description: Hart and Long combined for contested rebound leading to transition dunk.
events.impact: Key indicator of improved gang rebounding emphasis.

events.description: Patel called Spain pick-and-roll; Santos found Long for lob to seal game.
events.impact: Validated adjustments to leverage short-rolls after Sentinels loss.

metrics.notes: Allowed only 8 offensive rebounds; recorded 32 assists on 41 made shots.
